source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from data_source_table ( NOLOCK )

UserQuery.name: SinkPowerQueryBlobStorage
UserQuery.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkPowerQueryBlobStorage

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT LASTID 
  FROM [dbo].[IDLookup] ( NOLOCK )
 WHERE TABLENAME = 'DIMCUSTOMER'
SELECT MAX([CustomerKey]) AS CurrentId FROM [dbo].[DimCustomer] ( NOLOCK )

DECLARE @JOBNAME VARCHAR ( 50 ) = 'TEST'

;WITH JOBINFO AS 
     (
	 SELECT TOP 1 
	        1 AS 'ORDERING'
		    , CASE JOBHIS.RUN_STATUS
			      WHEN 0 THEN 'FAILED'
				  WHEN 1 THEN 'SUCCESSED'
				  WHEN 2 THEN 'RETRY'
				  WHEN 3 THEN 'CANCELLED'
				  ELSE 'UNKNOWN'
			  END AS 'JOBOUTCOME'
			  --, MSDB.DBO.AGENT_DATETIME( CAST( RUN_DATE AS VARCHAR( 15 ) ) , CAST( RUN_TIME  AS VARCHAR( 15 ) ))			  
	   FROM [MSDB].[DBO].[SYSJOBHISTORY] JOBHIS ( NOLOCK )
	   JOIN [MSDB].[DBO].[SYSJOBS] JOBS ( NOLOCK )
	     ON JOBHIS.JOB_ID = JOBS.JOB_ID
	  WHERE JOBHIS.STEP_ID = 0
	    AND JOBS.NAME = @JOBNAME
		AND MSDB.DBO.AGENT_DATETIME( CAST( RUN_DATE AS VARCHAR( 15 ) ) , CAST( RUN_TIME  AS VARCHAR( 15 ) )) >= DATEADD( MINUTE, -5, GETDATE() )
	  ORDER BY JOBHIS.RUN_DATE DESC, JOBHIS.RUN_TIME DESC
	 ), 
     RESULTS AS
	 (
	 SELECT 2 AS 'ORDERING'
	        , 'UNKNOWN' AS 'JOBOUTCOME'
	  UNION 
	 SELECT * 
	   FROM JOBINFO
	 )
	 SELECT TOP 1 JOBOUTCOME FROM RESULTS ORDER BY ORDERING

DECLARE @JOBNAME VARCHAR( 15 ) = 'TEST'
SELECT TOP 1 
	--1 AS 'ORDERING'
	  JOBS.NAME AS JOBNAME
	  , CASE JOBHIS.RUN_STATUS
			WHEN 0 THEN 'FAILED'
			WHEN 1 THEN 'SUCCESSED'
			WHEN 2 THEN 'RETRY'
			WHEN 3 THEN 'CANCELLED'
			ELSE 'UNKNOWN'
		END AS 'JOBOUTCOME'
        , MSDB.DBO.AGENT_DATETIME( CAST( RUN_DATE AS VARCHAR( 15 ) ) , CAST( RUN_TIME  AS VARCHAR( 15 ) )) AS COMPLETIONTIME	 	  
FROM [MSDB].[DBO].[SYSJOBHISTORY] JOBHIS ( NOLOCK )
JOIN [MSDB].[DBO].[SYSJOBS] JOBS ( NOLOCK )
	ON JOBHIS.JOB_ID = JOBS.JOB_ID
WHERE JOBHIS.STEP_ID = 0
AND JOBS.NAME = @JOBNAME
AND MSDB.DBO.AGENT_DATETIME( CAST( RUN_DATE AS VARCHAR( 15 ) ) , CAST( RUN_TIME  AS VARCHAR( 15 ) )) >= DATEADD( MINUTE, -2, GETDATE() )
ORDER BY JOBHIS.RUN_DATE DESC, JOBHIS.RUN_TIME DESC

sources.name: AzureSQLPracticeDBDimCustomer
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSQLPracticeDBDimCustomer

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared AzureSQLPracticeDBDimCustomer = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("twadfpractice.database.windows.net", "Practice001", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "DimCustomer"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = AzureSQLPracticeDBDimCustomer,
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each ([GeographyKey] = 8))
in
  #"Filtered rows";

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(movie = toInteger(movie)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 split(length(title) <= 5,
	disjoint: false) ~> GoodRows@(GoodRows, BadRows)
GoodRows@GoodRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		NAME as string,
		ID as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	mapColumn(
		NAME = title,
		ID = movie
	)) ~> AzureSQLDBTable
GoodRows@BadRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[("BadRows_{currentDate()}.txt")],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> BadRows

parameters{
	parameter1 as date (currentDate())
}
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesDB
MoviesDB filter(toInteger(year) >= 1910 && toInteger(year) <= 2000 && rlike(genres, 'Comedy')) ~> FilterYears
FilterYears aggregate(groupBy(year,
		title),
	AverageComedyRating = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> AggregateComedyRatings
AggregateComedyRatings, MoviesDB join(AggregateComedyRatings@title == MoviesDB@title
	&& AggregateComedyRatings@year == MoviesDB@year,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		genres,
		title = AggregateComedyRatings@title,
		year = AggregateComedyRatings@year,
		Rating,
		AverageComedyRating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
AggregateComedyRatings sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[("{currentDate()} .txt"
)],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> Sink
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[("JoinResult_{currentDate()}.txt")],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
